meanings.sent1: The farmer disposed of the ordures in the compost pile.
meanings.sent2: The alley was filled with ordures and garbage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog rolled in the ordures, much to the dismay of its owner.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were covered in ordures after the parade.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ordures lingered in the air, making everyone wrinkle their noses.

meanings.sent1: She scrubbed the floor to remove the ordures left by the muddy boots.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was filled with ordures and cobwebs.
meanings.sent3: The children played in the ordures, pretending it was a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: His mind was clouded with ordures of doubt and regret.
meanings.sent5: The old well was clogged with ordures, preventing water from flowing freely.
